name: SSF20
title: Site-Specific Factor 20
subtitle: Tumor Infiltrating Lymphocytes (TIL)
notes:
**Note 1:**  Tumor infiltrating lymphocytes (TILs) are white blood cells that have migrated into a tumor from the bloodstream.  They are believed to represent an immune reaction/response to the tumor cells.  A brisk response may indicate a favorable prognosis.

**Note 2:** Code the status of tumor infiltrating lymphocytes (TIL) in the primary tumor as documented in the pathology report.
rows: Not applicable: Information not collected for this case
No histologic examination of primary site

Unknown or no information
Not documented in patient record
